value:
I had imagined being a Hero would
be freeing, but many here seem like
they're just as stiff as they were...$k$pIs it a symptom of being too strong,
I wonder?

Only women can ride pegasusback,
so all pegasus knights are women.
Ilian men all work the fields.

Eat when you have food and rest
when you have shelter! That's how
mercenaries live!

Being a pegasus knight costs money.
The noble pegasus must eat noble
carrots, after all!

Those damn nobles, taking advantage
of my sister and her contract breach.
They'll get theirs before it's over...

I'm Farina, of the Ilian Strongwings,
requested by Lord Hector himself!
It'll be 20,000 gold for my service.

We have a saying in Ilia: One foe for
country, and another foe for family!
...Actually, I just made that up.

Did you see that? You get all 20,000
gold's worth from me!
Hey! What're these scraps?!

Wait, really? ...You're not going to ask
me to pay you back later, are you?

I am Farina, of Ilia's third division
of pegasus knights. Want my help?
It usually runs about 20,000 gold.

Hey! You have a moment to chat,
$Nu?$k$pThis might seem a bit sudden, but...
how much is Askr paying you? Don't
tell me nothing! Seriously?!$k$pSeems like you have no plans for
your own future. You think you can
live without worry—but you can't!$k$pEvery service has its price, so why
don't we get you set up with a real
contract, hm? Just leave it to me!$k$pI'll even offer you a special rate and
just take a mere 20% commission off
the top for doing the negotiating.$k$pAll right! Let's go nail down the
details of the terms!
やあっ
ふふん！
くっ
Whoa...
I earn my fee!
Not good enough.
Money well spent!
I'm here for the money!
All that...money...
weird laugh?
I'm Farina, a mercenary member of the Strongwings, the third wing of the Ilian Pegasus Knights. Of course, I assume you know all that...
Whoa, hey there! My time is worth money, so don't waste it.
Fiora, Farina, and Florina—the three of us sisters are the beauties of Ilia.
How much are they paying you? My last job paid 20,000 gold...
A woman needs an income! You have to be willing to walk away if they try to offer you less than you're worth!
Fiora, Florina... I'll be back one day...and I'll be hauling lots of gold.
I will carry this entire operation on my back if I have to, so you should offer me a startlingly high salary!
Sure, let's try it.
Oh?
This'll be nice!
